title: The Gentle Corsican
creator_credit: Anthony Simmons, John Arnold, Leon Clore, Harlequin Productions and Republic Pictures Corporation
brief_description: A father and son live alone in Corsica, living a subsistance existence among the wealthy tourists. French film dubbed in English.
